templates.name: cli_basic
templates.content:
#!/bin/bash
# Basic usage template for test-tool

# ⚠️ PITFALL: Ensure input file exists before running
INPUT_FILE="${1:-data.txt}"

if [ ! -f "$INPUT_FILE" ]; then
    echo "Error: Input file not found: $INPUT_FILE"
    exit 1
fi

# Run test-tool with basic options
test-tool run --input "$INPUT_FILE" --output results.txt

templates.name: cli_batch
templates.content:
#!/bin/bash
# Batch processing template for test-tool

# ⚠️ PITFALL: Ensure all files exist before batch processing
INPUT_DIR="${1:-.}"
OUTPUT_DIR="${2:-./results}"

mkdir -p "$OUTPUT_DIR"

for file in "$INPUT_DIR"/*.txt; do
    if [ -f "$file" ]; then
        basename="$(basename "$file" .txt)"
        test-tool run --input "$file" --output "$OUTPUT_DIR/$basename.json" --format json
    fi
done
